text: Gaon Connection Insights @RuralInsightsGC, the data & insights arm of @GaonConnection, has recently released findings of its third survey as an #opensource 'The Rural Report 3: COVID-19 Vaccine and Rural India'. Download the report at https://t.co/fRRUveGdk2 #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/Mf3VfhNJTF
